description_template.name: Vulnerability Description Enhancement
description_template.description: Template used to enhance vulnerability descriptions with contextual information

remediation_template.name: Vulnerability Remediation
remediation_template.description: Template used to generate detailed remediation steps for vulnerabilities

description.name: Section Enhancement - Description
description.description: Template used to enhance the description section of a vulnerability
description.template: Generate a detailed description for the vulnerability: {vulnerability_name}. This should explain what the vulnerability is, how it works, and why it's a security concern. The severity of this vulnerability is {severity}. The affected endpoint is: {endpoint}. Here is the evidence of the vulnerability: {evidence}.

risk.name: Section Enhancement - Risk
risk.description: Template used to enhance the risk section of a vulnerability
risk.template: Generate a comprehensive risk assessment for the vulnerability: {vulnerability_name}. Explain the potential risks to the organization if this vulnerability is exploited. The severity of this vulnerability is {severity}. The affected endpoint is: {endpoint}. Here is the evidence of the vulnerability: {evidence}.

impact.name: Section Enhancement - Impact
impact.description: Template used to enhance the impact section of a vulnerability
impact.template: Generate an impact analysis for the vulnerability: {vulnerability_name}. Describe the potential impact on the organization, users, and data if this vulnerability is exploited. The severity of this vulnerability is {severity}. The affected endpoint is: {endpoint}. Here is the evidence of the vulnerability: {evidence}.

examples.name: Section Enhancement - Examples
examples.description: Template used to enhance the examples section of a vulnerability
examples.template: Provide real-world examples of how the vulnerability: {vulnerability_name} has been exploited in the past. Include notable security incidents, breaches, or attacks that utilized this type of vulnerability. The severity of this vulnerability is {severity}. The affected endpoint is: {endpoint}. Here is the evidence of the vulnerability: {evidence}.

remediation.name: Section Enhancement - Remediation
remediation.description: Template used to enhance the remediation section of a vulnerability
remediation.template: Provide detailed remediation steps for the vulnerability: {vulnerability_name}. Include specific code examples, configuration changes, or best practices to fix this issue. The severity of this vulnerability is {severity}. The affected endpoint is: {endpoint}. Here is the evidence of the vulnerability: {evidence}.
